name: Rogue4096
description:
Created for #LowRezJam2017

Credits:

  • Game engine: Duality
  • Fonts and color palette: Pico-8
  • Music by Socapex

Features:

  • Procedural dungeon generation
  • Vision subsystem
  • Semi-procedural item generation
  • Character inventory
  • Combat system inspired by pen-and-paper RPG-s
  • Multi-floor dungeon
  • A Boss Fight!
  • Hackable

Controls:

  • Arrow keys for combat and movement
  • "Space" key to pick up items
  • "I" key to show inventory

For more gameplay information, please refer to the downloadable cheatsheet.
